name: edp: Eiffel Design Project (IDE)
short_description: The Eiffel Developers Project (EDP) is an IDE (Integrated Development Environment) for browsing, editing, validating and (eventually) compiling and executing programs written in Eiffel on Linux and Windows on Intel/AMD.
